oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Enoch Collins to Capt. Lewis Collins warning of raid on Athens, Tenn.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Dear Sir. There is woman in town who says that Polk Pain told the day you got him that there was to be a raid on this place and that ten of the boys belonging to your company was ready to go with them when they came and that they was to capture as many Union as possible and take out with them. You best cum [sid] down abe on the look out as it sounds and looks precisely to me like it might be something."
